column1: * 1914 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the poem The Voyage of Eärendel the Evening Star.
* 1982 - Oxonmoot 1982 at the Cotswold Lodge Hotel.
* 2002 - The GBA version of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) are released in North America.
* 2010 - Lasse Lanta Autumn Meeting of the Austrian Tolkien Society.
** Gildor and Wandering Companies return from pilgrimage to the palantír of the Tower Hills to Rivendell.

column2: Samwise Gamgee and Peregrin Took encounter the Nazgûl near Woody End; they flee because of the approaching Elves chanting. The Hobbits camp with the Elves.
